name: td-playwright
description: <!-- To start a new Playwright project --> npm init playwright@latest

scripts.clean:reports: npm i -g rimraf && rimraf allure-report allure-results && mkdirp allure-report allure-results
scripts.posttest: npm run generate:reports && npm run open:reports
scripts.test: npm run execute:script || npm run posttest

author: Taras Dubkovych
